Title: Burning Out
Description:
Please, I know how this looks, but we are on the same side!

My siblings and I intended to defect from the Flame together. However, none of them have escaped or met up with me since I left, and it's been days! I fear the worst.

Do you think I would be begging for aid, alone and unarmed, if I was not honest? Please, find them. They are all I have left.
ObjectivesText: Find Solarys's siblings in the Smoldering Copse.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Solarys at the Central Encampment.
